title: FS:  Terrific PSA 4 Marquard, Willis--price cuts
author: GregMitch34

posts.post_title: FS:  Terrific PSA 4 Marquard, Willis--price cuts
posts.post_content:
I've decided to move some really terrific and favorite PSA 4 t206 HOFers and concentrate on obtaining new 5s.  Willis portrait, plus Marquard hands at side both have great centering and images.  Ditto on this PSA 4  Bescher. Centering!  

Here are the prices, add $4 shipping for each, PayPal gift.

Bresnahan    SOLD
Griffith       SOLD  
Marquard     $189
Willis      $179
Bescher       SOLD
Violat  $229   SOLD
